SELECT db.* FROM devops_branch db
NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM devops_issue_rel dir WHERE dir.object_id = db.id AND dir.issue_id = #{issueId} AND dir.object = 'branch' )
AND db.app_service_id = #{appServiceId}
AND db.branch_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam.branchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND
db.branch_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
ORDER BY
${sortString},
db.branch_name = 'master' DESC, db.id DESC
mapper.delete: delete from devops_branch where is_deleted = true

DELETE FROM devops_branch WHERE (app_service_id, branch_name) IN ( SELECT t.app_service_id, t.branch_name FROM (SELECT app_service_id, branch_name FROM devops_branch GROUP BY app_service_id, branch_name HAVING count(1) > 1) t ) AND id NOT IN ( SELECT dt.id FROM (SELECT max(id) AS id FROM devops_branch GROUP BY app_service_id, branch_name HAVING count(1) > 1) dt )
mapper.select: SELECT db.*,das.project_id FROM devops_branch db JOIN devops_app_service das on db.app_service_id = das.id JOIN devops_issue_rel dir ON dir.object_id=db.id WHERE dir.object='branch' AND dir.issue_id=#{issueId} ORDER BY das.project_id
SELECT db.* FROM devops_branch db WHERE db.issue_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM devops_branch db WHERE db.issue_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT db.id,dgc.id AS commitId FROM devops_gitlab_commit dgc INNER JOIN devops_branch db ON db.branch_name = dgc.ref AND db.app_service_id=dgc.app_service_id WHERE dgc.id IN
#{commitId}
